snippet: The rescue of Los Angeles-based IndyMac Bancorp may provide lessons for what the losses required by the Bank of Cyprus bailout will mean.
abstract: News analysis; 2008 bailout of Los Angeles-based savings and loan institution IndyMac Bancorp, which involved 50 percent losses on deposits, offers glimpse of likely fallout from huge investor losses that will be part of Cypriot bailout.
lead_paragraph: The rescue of Los Angeles-based IndyMac Bancorp may provide lessons for what the losses required by the Bank of Cyprus bailout will mean.

headline.seo: Calculating Impact of Cyprus’s Bank Bailout
headline.main: Calculating the Impact of Cyprus’s Bailout
headline.print_headline: Calculating the Impact of Cyprus’s Bailout
